description:
Croix Meridies is a new teacher at Luna Nova Magical Academy who specializes in technomagic. She was once close friends with http://anidb.net/ch53389 [Chariot] and previously helped her in searching for the Grand Triskelion`s words, but grew spiteful towards her over not being chosen to wield the Shiny Rod.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Croix Meridies
